title: Total number of employees of Kohl 's 2012 to 2018
summary: Overall Number of employees in thousands has decreased over the Year.
Number of employees in thousands is slightly decreasing from 2017 to 2018.
The steepest decrease occurs in between the Year 2017 and 2018.
The highest Number of employees in thousands, of value 137.0 was reached at Year 2017
Minimum Number of employees in thousands about 129.0 was reached at Year 2018
